entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow near the American border before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Periods of snow near the American border. Amount 2 cm near the American border. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
